name: UCCE & IPCC Cisco Callboards
short_description:
Using PHP and MySQL this application allows people to set up a call board in a sales or customer services environment it will display total calls, CPT and Abandoned calls and total calls in the queue.

If there are any calls in the queue the screen goes red grabbing the attention of staff so they can answer the call.

The page and query can be modified so you can display nearly any information that you want.

The code is open source i just ask that you consider denotations so that i can provide updates and more products.
summary: This application allows to display how many calls are in a phone queue
external_homepage: Cisco IPCC and UCCE Callbaord webpage
